unnormalised: Tantrik shiksha (ABCDE1234F) 31/03/2024 poilim tumchea Aadhaar card-ak zodoit, ani jurmane divop avoid kor. Tumchem GSTIN (zoxem, 06AAACC1234A1ZJ) nirantar vevsai cholovpak update korunk visrum naka.
normalised: tumchem P-A-N card (zoxem A-B-C-D-E ek don tin char F) tumchea Aadhaar cardak tis ekvis march don hozar ani chovis meren joddchea dandd thambouche khatir, ani tumchem G-S-T-I-N (zoxem shunya so A-A-A-C-C ek don tin char A ek Z-J) nirantar veparachea karya khatir update korunk visronaka.
